com.anifichadia.toolkit.file.io

Class FileManager<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.anifichadia.toolkit.file.io.FileManager<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - Type of object to read from or write to files
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SerializableFileManager, StringEncodeFileManager

    public abstract class FileManager<T>
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract class for file I/O operations.
    Author:
    Aniruddh Fichadia | Email: Ani.Fichadia@gmail.com | GitHub Username: AniFichadia (http://github.com/AniFichadia)

        Returns:

      • writeToFile

                  T object,
                  boolean replaceIfExists)
        Write specified object to file.
        Parameters:
        file - File to write to
        object - Object to write to the file
        replaceIfExists - Boolean to replace the file if it already exists
        Returns:
        Boolean representing write success or failure
